descriptionHtml:
New Messenger lite 2021 is an UNOFFICIAL messaging app that uses Telegram API, Textnow and textfree.

Messenger Text and Video chat for free and group chats and telegram channels

Telegram Plus 2021 with Free video calls and group chats and many other features similar to Telegram X plus

Instant messaging with Telegram x plus 2021 — simple, fast, secure, and synced across all your devices.

New Messenger lite 2021 app is similar to Facebook messenger and Telegram x and signal private messenger and viber messenger, messenger kids, WhatsApp messenger and imo free calls

Join telegram channels and telegram x plus 2021 groups like Facebook messenger groups and meet new people

With Telegram Plus 2021 Chat and text for free with other people like WhatsApp messenger in channels and groups

Make Free Audio and Video Calls 2021 Make crystal-clear audio and instant video calls to friends and family like imo messenger. Group chat or a group video call. Enjoy completely free video calls and chat every day.

FAST Messenger lite 2021 app : Messenger lite 2021 is the fastest messages app on the market, connecting people via a unique like WeChat, distributed network of data centers around the globe similar to line free calls & messages and Skype Free video calls

UNLIMITED texting app 2021 : You can send media and files, without any limits on their type and size. Your entire chat history will require no disk space on your device, and will be securely stored in the Telegram cloud for as long as you need it in this meet app.

USE TELEGRAM STICKERS 2021, GIFS AND TELEGRAM EMOJIS 🚨
Express more with stickers, GIFs or Emojis. Send and receive stickers. Surprise your friends and give your messages emotions. It's easy and fun, text now and text free in this meeting app

POWERFUL chatting app 2021 : You can create telegram channels and telegram 2021 chats, telegram X 2021 groups with up to 200,000 members, share large videos, documents of any
type (.DOCX, .MP3, .ZIP, etc.) up to 2 GB each, and even set up bots for specific tasks. Telegram is the perfect chatting app for hosting online communities and coordinating teamwork.


FUN messages app: Telegram x 2021 has powerful photo and video editing tools, animated stickers and emoji, fully customizable themes to change the appearance of your app, and an open sticker/GIF platform to cater to all your expressive needs.

👥 List of the best Telegram x channels, groups, bots and telegram stickers. You can search channels, sort them or rate them to be on top of the list.

Free Video & Voice Calls in Telegram x Plus 2021: Always wanted to make video calls while using Telegram? Our free, high quality & secure video call service is here to give you what you always wished for. 

 Fonts and Themes: If you got tired of your messenger's look, just try some new fonts and themes that we have gathered for you.
Messenger adds some extra features to official Telegram x app:

• Separated tabs for chats: users, groups, channels, bots, favorites, unread, admin/creator.

• Many options to cutomize tabs.

• Categories. Create custom groups of chats (family, work, sports...).

• Copy selection of text message.

• Select all chats and apply different
options (read, mute/unmute, archive...).

• Set photo quality before sending.

• Show download progress.

• Easily switch to night mode from navigation menu.
• Telegram x english support: and many more languages like telegram arabic, telegram french, telegram chinese, telegram indian, telegram german, telegram japanese.

the best group chat app 2021 similar to groupme, facebook messenger, textnow, textfree, meetme, meet app and group app

And many more features

Download Messenger lite 2021 free chat, free calls, textnow and textfree
